longBusinessSummary: AGTech Holdings Limited operates as an integrated technology and services company in the People's Republic of China and Macau. It operates through Lottery Operation and Electronic Payment and Related Services segments. Lottery Operation segment engages in sale and leasing of lottery hardware including provision of related after-sale services; and provision of lottery distribution and ancillary services. Its Electronic Payment and Related Services segment offers payment card and ancillary services, as well as e-wallet services; provides acquiring services for other payment services providers; and engages in sale and leasing of payment terminals and equipment, and other related services. In addition, the company research and develop sports lottery information technology, payment and marketing platforms; provides sports lottery management and marketing consulting services through offline channel; engages in research, development, and sale of sports lottery terminals and systems; and online information services, as well as sale and lease of payment terminals and equipment. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong. AGTech Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Ali Fortune Investment Holding Limited.

companyOfficers.name: Ms. Wai Yan  Lee
